onyomiExamples.meaning: next, hypo- (i.e. containing an element with low valence), order, sequence, time, times
third, tertiary, cubic (function, equation, etc.), third-order
gradually (progress into a state), in sequence, in order, in turn

depending on, as soon as, immediately after, upon, as (e.g. "as one is told", "as one wishes"), whatever (e.g. "whatever is at hand"), order, program, programme, precedence, circumstances, course of events, state of things, reason
way, path, route, along the way, along the road

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to rank next to, to come after
agency, commission, distributor, intermediation, reception (of guests), conveyance (of messages)

joining, joint, intermediation, acting as an intermediary, relaying, taking over, middle relief pitcher, middle reliever, pole-shaped item with a join in the middle, tea container with a lid that is the same size as the body
